name: Custerian Wristguards
flavorText: "In ancient times, there lived a strange race of people—the Custerians. No one knows who they were, or what they were doing, but their legacy remains beaten into the very metal of these wristguards." —Yuan, wise man of Tufnyl
flavorTextHtml: "In ancient times, there lived a strange race of people—the Custerians. No one knows who they were, or what they were doing, but their legacy remains beaten into the very metal of these wristguards." —Yuan, wise man of Tufnyl

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [4.5 - 6.0]%

secondary.textHtml: +[32 - 35]% Extra Gold from Monsters
Picking up gold grants experience. (Emanates)
